name: Yerlik
description:
Yerlik is a game with new, different mechanics and a twist at the end. We used Anatolian themed motifs, music and mythological creatures.

"I know you suffer. I will be your guardian angel during your quest. Collect all the keys and go deeper and deeper."

Your purpose is to reach the bottom of a dungeon with 7 levels, while your guardian angel guides you through your journey. Some of the mechanics you'll see in the game:

  • Nazars which tempt the protagonist, pulling him to an instant death when he touches them.
  • Foods (specifically, dürüms) that work as an HP power-up, but with a cost that you should discover by yourself in the game.
Credits

Programming: Ahmet Kamil Keleş

2D Art: Egesu Arpacı, Sercan Uysal

Music: Cemre Uyanık

----

Cheat: F1 passes the level
